projects.title: Job Tracker
projects.description: Job Tracker allows job seekers to easily stay organised with their job search. Users can track applications, update and save details such as interview dates and job sites, and track the application status. Users can also search saved applications by job title or company name. The app is built in Flutter (Dart), using Hive for local storage. and published as an Android app on Google Play Store.

projects.title: My Recipes
projects.description: An ASP.NET Core MVC web app using an SQL database and styled with Bootstrap. Users can create collections and edit/delete their own recipes. Admin users can approve new users and edit/delete any recipe.
extendedDescription: An ASP.NET Core MVC web app using an SQL database and styled with Bootstrap. Users can create collections and edit/delete their own recipes. Admin users can approve new users and edit/delete any recipe.

projects.title: What You Looking App?
projects.description: A React Native app using ViroReact Augmented Reality technology to display nearby points of interest on a live camera feed.
extendedDescription: A React Native app using ViroReact Augmented Reality technology to display nearby points of interest on a live camera feed.

projects.title: News Now
projects.description: A React Reddit style news website making use of an Express.js API and styling components for styling.
extendedDescription: A React Reddit style news website making use of an Express.js API and styling components for styling.

projects.title: News Now API
projects.description: A PSQL database project using Express.js to access endpoints and retrieve data.
extendedDescription: A PSQL database project using Express.js to access endpoints and retrieve data.

projects.title: Hangman Game
projects.description: A React hangman app using a word game API and Vanilla CSS for styling.
extendedDescription: A React hangman app using a word game API and Vanilla CSS for styling.

projects.title: JavaScript Calculator
projects.description: A simple JavaScript/HTML calculator using CSS to style and animate.
extendedDescription: A simple JavaScript/HTML calculator using CSS to style and animate.
